Welcome my blog. This will be a space to jot down ideas, experiments, and things I find interesting. I love having a nice visualization to go along with code and analysis, so to kick off I'll just include this incredible image of the Yukon Delta in Alaska.

![False-color image of the Yukon Delta, Alaska, USA ([source](https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:YukonDelta_ASTER_2002may26.jpg))](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/6e/YukonDelta_ASTER_2002may26.jpg/480px-YukonDelta_ASTER_2002may26.jpg

# Topics
Some major themes will be:

* Remote sensing
* Environment
* Climate
* Weather
* Demographics
* Geospatial data

As well as software and tools such as:

* Python
* Julia
* Machine Learning / Artificial intelligence
* Cloud native data
* Geospatial software

# Tech stack
I'm building this website with [Quarto](https://quarto.org/) and [Pixi](https://pixi.sh/).
